resources.string: This is where the question will be placed
You\'re an adventurous dog and today you\'re going on a walk with your master. Even though you like your owner, she can be a little boring for your taste so you have a plan to lighten up the day!
But before we go, what was your name again?
As a revenge, once home, you plan to shit on the carpet. Bite the hand that feeds you!
Your owner heard you barking. You\'ve been caught!
You bump into the dog you over-peed earlier. He\'s charging aggressively towards you. Start barking to show who\'s boss!
You\'ve escaped your master\'s wicked clutches! Your nose picks up a delicious smell. You decide to find the origin of this lovely bouquet.
As if your day couldn\'t get any better... The wind knocked over a garbage can and the ground is covered with mouth-watering snacks. \n\nWhat will you eat?
"You caught the cat! That's one less degenerate to worry about! You decide to celebrate with marking the territory with a whiff of pee."
"You lost the cat and hope other dogs didn't see you. You decide to mask your incompetence and show your dominance with your pee."
You spotted a wild cat. Since cats are inferior and need to be destroyed, you have no choice but to chase it. Start running!
Dog\'s can\'t eat chocolate! You should have known better!
